titleInfo.title: Mrs. Jimmie Rodgers w/Ernest Tubb - Bluebird 6698 dub (We Miss Him When The Evening Shadows Fall)

mods.abstract: Mrs. Jimmie Rodgers' We Miss Him When The Evening Shadows Fall, likely a dub from the 78 release, Bluebird 6698.
